channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin in playground, 30th June
item.description:
Overflowing, please empty urgently, thanks

item.title: Weed killing needed Brunel Drive and Castle Close Gotherington, 30th June
item.description:
Brunel Drive and Castle Close Gotherington. The footpaths and kerb edges need weed killing due to a gradual build up of weeds on the flags and kerb edges. It is two years since these streets were adopted and they have received no attention yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cinder Close, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: There is a large amount of rubbish right across the carriageway of the roundabout at the onslip and offslip southbound of junction 11A. Could pose a danger to traffic, 30th June
item.description:
Rubbish stewn on carriageway entry and exit to M5 southbound
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Interchange, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
